Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Garden Lodge Sydney in Haberfield (Inner West), you'll be close to Italian Forum and University of Sydney. This family-friendly motel is within close proximity of Marrickville Market and Enmore Theatre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 32 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Rooms have private balconies. Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. Digital programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. If you're ready for some gaming fun, you can hop on the complimentary casino shuttle.

Dining
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store serving guests of Garden Lodge Sydney.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store serving guests of Garden Lodge Sydney.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

With a stay at Garden Lodge Sydney in Haberfield (Inner West), you'll be close to Italian Forum and University of Sydney. This family-friendly motel is within close proximity of Marrickville Market and Enmore Theatre.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Italian Forum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Marrickville Market - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
Enmore Theatre - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Marrickville Metro - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Royal Prince Alfred Hospital - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Sze Yup Temple - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
University of Sydney - 3.9 km / 2.5 mi
Birkenhead Point Outlet Centre - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Blackwattle Bay Park - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Sydney Exhibition Centre - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Glebe Markets - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Carriageworks - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Seymour Centre - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Wolli Creek Village Square - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Broadway Shopping Center - 4.8 km / 3 mi

The preferred airport for Garden Lodge Sydney is Sydney, NSW (SYD-Kingsford Smith Intl.) - 5.7 km / 3.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
